issue.title: [CF 361] Timer Text
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.112, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1

Installed Version

4.6.7

Description

Show timer & Show timer text are enable, but i don't have any timer text on my spell cooldown, buff & debuffs

Installed Addons

Archy - Archaeology Assistant - 1.8.9 AtlasLoot Enhanced - v6.05.00 BigWigs Bossmods - r8781-release CombustionHelper - CombustionHelper 2.8 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.94-r6221 eAlign - 4.2.1 ElvUI - ElvUI v3.0.1 ElvUI_AtlasLoot_Skin - 1.5 Masque - 4.2.375 Masque: Caith - v4.2.76 Masque: Darion - 4.1 Masque: Trinity - 40300.1 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.6.112 mRunes - 1.27 Omen Threat Meter - v3.1.4 Postal - v3.4.10 Recount - v4.3.0a release ReforgeLite - v1.09.2 ReforgeSaver - v1.3 TellMeWhen - 4.6.7


> Posted by CurseForge user Sadykk | Imported from CurseForge issue #361 | Raw

comments.body:
As the tooltip of the Show Timer Text setting says, OmniCC is required to show the timer text on icons.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
